
```{r}
# Check the merge
unique(combined_data$cell_type)

# Recall the CellChat object
cellchat <- readRDS("Myeloid_Lymphoid_scRNA_cellchat.rds")

# carotid vs femoral table
table(cellchat@meta$orig.ident)
```

## Sample subsetting
```{r}
# Define femoral v.s. carotid
carotid_ids <- c("carotid 1 & 2", "carotid 3", "carotid 4")
femoral_ids <- setdiff(unique(combined_data@meta.data$orig.ident), carotid_ids)

# Subset the combined data for each group
carotid_data <- combined_data[, combined_data@meta.data$orig.ident %in% carotid_ids]

femoral_data <- combined_data[, combined_data@meta.data$orig.ident %in% femoral_ids]
```

## Carotid sample analysis
```{r}
# carotid
cellchat_carotid <- createCellChat(object = carotid_data, meta = carotid_data@meta.data, group.by = "cell_type")

# Set the ligand-receptor interaction database
CellChatDB.use <- CellChatDB.human

# Using a subset of CellChatDB for cell-cell communication analysis
CellChatDB.use <- subsetDB(CellChatDB.human, search = "Secreted Signaling")

# Add the Secreted Signaling database in the CellChat object
cellchat_carotid@DB <- CellChatDB.use

```

```{r}
# Pre-process the expression data
cellchat_carotid <- subsetData(cellchat_carotid)
cellchat_carotid <- identifyOverExpressedGenes(cellchat_carotid)
cellchat_carotid <- identifyOverExpressedInteractions(cellchat_carotid)

```

```{r}
# Project gene expression data onto protein-protein interaction (PPI)
cellchat_carotid <- projectData(cellchat_carotid, PPI.human)
```

```{r}
# Compute communication probabilities again
cellchat_carotid <- computeCommunProb(cellchat_carotid, raw.use = FALSE)
```

```{r}
# Filter out the cell-cell communication if there are only few number of cells in certain cell groups
cellchat_carotid <- filterCommunication(cellchat_carotid, femoraln.cells = 10)

```

```{r}
# Infer the cell-cell communication at a signaling pathway level
cellchat_carotid <- computeCommunProbPathway(cellchat_carotid)

```

```{r}
# Calculate the aggregated cell-cell communication network
cellchat_carotid <- aggregateNet(cellchat_carotid)
cellchat_carotid@net$count
cellchat_carotid@net$weight

```

## Network plot visualization of carotid v.s. femoral samples
```{r}
# Calculate group size for each cellchat object
groupSize_carotid <- as.numeric(table(cellchat_carotid@idents))
groupSize_femoral <- as.numeric(table(cellchat_femoral@idents))

# Set the working directory 
setwd("/Volumes/biologos/Bioinformatics/230731_scRNA_CellChat/Visuals")

# Initialize the plot with a layout of 2x2 so that each condition can have two plots (one for interaction count and one for interaction weight)
par(mfrow = c(2, 2), xpd=TRUE)

png("NetworkPlot_NofInteractions_carotid.png", width=5, height=5, units="in", res=600)
netVisual_circle(cellchat_carotid@net$count, vertex.weight = groupSize_carotid, 
   weight.scale = T, label.edge= T, title.name = "carotid: Number of interactions")
dev.off()
png("NetworkPlot_InteractionStrength_carotid.png", width=5, height=5, units="in", res=600)
netVisual_circle(cellchat_carotid@net$weight, vertex.weight = groupSize_carotid, 
   weight.scale = T, label.edge= F, title.name = "carotid: Interaction weights/strength")
dev.off()

png("NetworkPlot_NofInteractions_femoral.png", width=5, height=5, units="in", res=600)
netVisual_circle(cellchat_femoral@net$count, vertex.weight = groupSize_femoral, 
   weight.scale = T, label.edge= T, title.name = "femoral: Number of interactions")
dev.off()
png("NetworkPlot_InteractionStrength_femoral.png", width=5, height=5, units="in", res=600)
netVisual_circle(cellchat_femoral@net$weight, vertex.weight = groupSize_femoral, 
   weight.scale = T, label.edge= F, title.name = "femoral: Interaction weights/strength")
dev.off()

```

## Pathway analysis
```{r}
# Set the working directory 
setwd("/Volumes/biologos/Bioinformatics/230731_scRNA_CellChat/Visuals")

png("InteractionStrength_carotid.png", width=8, height=8, units="in", res=600)
cellchat_carotid1 <- netAnalysis_computeCentrality(cellchat_carotid)
netAnalysis1 <- netAnalysis_signalingRole_scatter(cellchat_carotid1)
print(netAnalysis1)
dev.off()

png("InteractionStrength_femoral.png", width=8, height=8, units="in", res=600)
cellchat_femoral1 <- netAnalysis_computeCentrality(cellchat_femoral)
netAnalysis2 <- netAnalysis_signalingRole_scatter(cellchat_femoral1)
print(netAnalysis2)
dev.off()

# show all the interactions sending from Myeloid cell types to T cells
# Chord diagram
png("ChordDiagram_carotid.png", width=20, height=20, units="in", res=600)
chord1 <- netVisual_chord_gene(cellchat_carotid1, sources.use = c(6,7,9), targets.use = c(3,4,8), lab.cex = 1, link.target.prop = TRUE, show.legend=TRUE)
print(chord1)
dev.off()

png("ChordDiagram_femoral.png", width=20, height=20, units="in", res=600)
chord2 <- netVisual_chord_gene(cellchat_femoral1, sources.use = c(1,3,4,5), targets.use = 2, lab.cex = 1, link.target.prop = TRUE, show.legend=TRUE)
print(chord2)
dev.off()

# Bubble plot
png("BubblePlot_carotid.png", width=8, height=15, units="in", res=600)
bubble1 <- netVisual_bubble(cellchat_carotid1, sources.use = c(6,7,9), targets.use = c(3,4,8), remove.isolate = TRUE, angle.x=45)
print(bubble1)
dev.off()

png("BubblePlot_femoral.png", width=8, height=15, units="in", res=600)
bubble2 <- netVisual_bubble(cellchat_femoral1, sources.use = c(6,7,9), targets.use = c(3,4,8), remove.isolate = FALSE, angle.x=45)
print(bubble2)
dev.off()
```

## Violin plots of carotid v.s. femoral samples
```{r}
# install.packages("patchwork")
library(patchwork)

# Define gene list
gene_list <- c("FLT4", "KDR", "VASH1", "CCBE1", "CD36", "SYK", "MERTK", "AXL", "VEGFC", "IL1B", "IL10", "TNF")

# Normalize and scale carotid data
carotid_data <- NormalizeData(carotid_data)
carotid_data <- ScaleData(carotid_data, features = gene_list)

# Normalize and scale femoral data
femoral_data <- NormalizeData(femoral_data)
femoral_data <- ScaleData(femoral_data, features = gene_list)

# Generate violin plots for carotid cells
p_list <- list()
for (gene in gene_list) {
  p_list[[gene]] <- print(VlnPlot(carotid_data, features = gene, group.by = "annotation"))
}

# Combine all plots
p_combined <- wrap_plots(p_list, ncol = 4)

# Print the combined plot
print(p_combined)

# Generate violin plots for femoral cells
p_list2 <- list()
for (gene in gene_list) {
  p_list2[[gene]] <- print(VlnPlot(femoral_data, features = gene, group.by = "annotation"))
}

# Combine all plots
p_combined2 <- wrap_plots(p_list2, ncol = 4)

# Print the combined plot
print(p_combined2)

# Save the combined plot
ggsave("carotid_Violin_Plots.png", p_combined, width=45, height=35,dpi=600)
ggsave("femoral_Violin_Plots.png", p_combined2, width=45, height=35,dpi=600)
```
